trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityPackageContextConnectionInformation"></xref> class contains data about a secure connection.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityPackageContextConnectionInformation.AlgorithmIdentifier"></xref> property contains the encryption algorithm used by the connection.
The encryption algorithm used by the connection.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityPackageContextConnectionInformation.CipherStrength"></xref> property contains the cipher strength of the encryption algorithm used on this connection.
The cipher strength of the encryption algorithm used on this connection.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityPackageContextConnectionInformation.ExchangeStrength"></xref> property contains the exchange strength for this connection.
The exchange strength for this connection.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityPackageContextConnectionInformation.Hash"></xref> property contains the hashing algorithm used by this connection.
The hashing algorithm used by this connection.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityPackageContextConnectionInformation.HashStrength"></xref> property contains the strength of the hashing algorithm used on this connection.
The strength of the hashing algorithm used on this connection.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityPackageContextConnectionInformation.KeyExchangeAlgorithm"></xref> property contains the key exchange algorithm used by this connection.
The key exchange algorithm used by this connection.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityPackageContextConnectionInformation.Protocol"></xref> property contains the security protocol used by this connection.
The security protocol used by this connection.
